document.full_text: sunday's tornado here tore the roof of the johnson home on 29th street, ripped tiles off the floor and totaled two of the family's vehicles. but it did not take the family's grand piano.
document.title: in storm's aftermath, one family salvages what it can
lines_and_colors: sunday's tornado here tore the roof of the johnson home on 29th street, ripped tiles off the floor and totaled two of the family's vehicles. but it did not take the family's grand piano.
